document.full_text: washington redskins defensive lineman albert haynesworth was charged tuesday with misdemeanor sexual abuse for allegedly fondling the breast of his server in a hotel restaurant in washington.
document.title: redskins' haynesworth charged with sexual abuse
lines_and_colors: washington redskins defensive lineman albert haynesworth was charged tuesday with misdemeanor sexual abuse for allegedly fondling the breast of his server in a hotel restaurant in washington.
